paper.title: Incremental version-space merging
paper.abstract: This chapter describes the generalized version-space approach, as well as incremental version-space merging, the incremental learning method developed as part of the framework. The chapter begins with a description of the new, generalized form of version spaces. This is followed by a description of version-space merging, an algorithm for intersecting two version spaces in boundary-set notation. The chapter concludes with a description of its use in incremental version-space merging.
